name: Space (itch) (Zackary Felix)
description:
Summary:

Space is a game where you're sucked away into space, away from your friends. Try to escape the asteroid belt by launching yourself from rock to rock. 

Controls:

Every half-second your character will rotate 90 degrees.

Space = Launch yourself in the direction you're facing

You won't be able to launch until you make contact with ground again.

Credits

Art, animations, and bug-testing: https://expiration.itch.io/

Music by SergeQuadrado and Katzen Tupas.
